title: Demi Rose sets pulses racing in a blue showgirl-inspired ensemble for Halloween
text:
She is known for her sensational, sizzling displays.

And Demi Rose, 24, didn't disappoint as she stepped out to celebrate Halloween in Mayfair, London on Friday night.

The social media queen flaunted her incredible curves in a sexy devil showgirl ensemble which she teamed with black horns.

Eyes on her: Demi Rose, 24, sets pulses racing as she stepped out to celebrate Halloween in Mayfair, London on Friday night

The sequinned number perfectly hugged onto the contours of her eye-popping curves and rested high on her hips.

The eye-catching number boasted a cropped blue velvet train on both sides, which showed off her toned legs to perfection.

She toted her essentials in a glittering silver handbag while strutting along in a pair of chunky flatform ankle boots.

Demi tamed her glossy brunette locks in place with a black devil headband and enhanced her striking features with a sultry coat of make-up.

Working it: The social media queen flaunted her incredible curves in a sexy devil showgirl ensemble which she teamed with black horns

Wow: The sequinned number perfectly hugged onto the contours of her eye-popping curves and rested high on her hips

Walk this way: She toted her essentials in a glittering silver handbag while strutting along in a pair of chunky flatform ankle boots

The Instagram sensation has garnered the attention of 10.4million followers since she propelled to fame after being romantically linked to Kylie Jenner's ex Tyga.

Since then, the swimwear icon has mainly kept her love with DJ Chris Martinez on the down-low, but confirmed their split last week.

Demi and the DJ have vowed to continue as friends and to support each other's careers, despite the split.

A representative for the star told MailOnline: 'Unfortunately Demi & her boyfriend Chris Martinez have parted ways. They have ended as friends and continue to support each other throughout their careers.'

Babe: Demi tamed her glossy brunette locks in place with a black devil headband and enhanced her striking features with a sultry coat of make-up

Squad: The beauty was joined by her pals for the fun night out

Star: The Instagram sensation has garnered the attention of 10.4million followers since she propelled to fame after being romantically linked to Kylie Jenner's ex Tyga

Proving the split to be positive and healthy for the stunner, the rep continued: 'Demi is single and very happy working on her career in the USA.'

Though Demi is no stranger to flaunting her figure on social media, she has kept her relationship with DJ Chris on the down-low, with the former couple having enjoyed a private romance primarily out of the limelight.

The model has also been linked to DJ Tom Zanetti in the past. In the wake of their split, Demi took to Instagram to share a snap, captioned: 'Thinking of you.'

Despite her gruelling travelling schedule, the model insisted to MailOnline she sticks to her 'healthy' routine and she admitted nuts are the fattiest foods she eats.

Love life: Since then, the swimwear icon has mainly kept her love with DJ Chris Martinez on the down-low, but confirmed their split last week

Health: Despite her gruelling travelling schedule, the model insisted to MailOnline she sticks to her 'healthy' routine and she admitted nuts are the fattiest foods she eats

In September last year, Demi revealed: 'I try to keep as healthy as I can. With travelling, it's hard to work out, I travel across the world but try to keep my routine...

'Everyone says I'm the healthiest person they know. The fattiest thing I will ever eat is nuts and peanut butter.

'My figure just gains weight so fast. Any bad thing I eat my body isn't used to it and just puts on the weight. That means no birthday cake.

'All I've eaten today is nuts. I've managed to eat a whole pot. I feel guilty as there's a lot of fat in the nuts. That's my treat. So I'm happy.'
description: Demi Rose, 24, sets pulses racing as she stepped out to celebrate Halloween in Mayfair, London on Friday night.
